choose.when: insert into board values(null,#{title},#{contents}, #{hit},date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s'), (select IFNULL(MAX(group_no),0)+1 from board b),#{orderNo},#{depth},#{userNo})

mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate ,b.user_no as userNo,b.group_no as groupNo ,u.name as userName,b.depth FROM user u, board b WHERE u.no = b.user_no AND (title like "%${keyword}%" OR contents like "%${keyword}%") ORDER BY group_no DESC, order_no ASC;

SELECT b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate ,b.user_no as userNo,b.group_no as groupNo ,u.name as userName FROM user u, board b WHERE u.no = b.user_no and b.no = #{value} ORDER BY group_no DESC, order_no ASC

mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE board SET order_no=order_no+1 WHERE group_no = #{groupNo} and order_no >= #{orderNo}
